cmd.help.old.content:
Je suis un Shinigami, venant du royaume des morts. :wing:

**RÃ©cupÃ¨re ton Death Note avec `/claim`**
Tu peux Ã©crire des noms avec `/kira`
DÃ©fends toi en tuant ton agresseur
Accumule des pommes avec `/apple`
PiÃ¨ge tes amis avec `/trick`
Fait grandir le monde de Kira avec `/invite`
Et d'autres, mais j'ai la flemme de t'expliquer. $[view]
-# Les commandes sont disponibles sur les serveurs dicord
cmd.help.step.fail.notdone: **Non !** Tu n'as pas fini cette tÃ¢che.
cmd.help.step.0:
I am a Shinigami, coming from the realm of death. :wing:
Complete this `/help` tutorial and I will give you a cool pen.
-# Remember that I can speak many languages, change with `/lang`.
cmd.help.step.1: First of all, **Claim your Death Note using `/claim`.**
cmd.help.step.2:
Then, **write someone's name** with `/kira`.
-# Do `/rules` to read __How to Use It__ (rules of Death Note).
cmd.help.step.3:
### Now, your life is changed forever, dear murderer.
But death is parth of life, so that fine. :ok_hand:

-# Author warning : Death Note is a roleplay and sometimes ironical.
-# **Never harm or bully someone**. This is the first and last warning.
cmd.help.step.4:
You can look at your running attacks with `/running`.
Counter an attack by using `/kira` on your attacker.
But be warned : there is a limit to that!
cmd.help.step.5:
Read your Death Note with `/see`.
Can be funny.
cmd.help.step.6:
Get apples with `/apple`.
Killing huge killers gets you more apples. :feather:
cmd.help.step.7:
Check you pen with `/pocket`.
You can get a new one with `/shop`. :pen_fountain:
cmd.help.step.8:
Items can have different uses and properties.
Find them all! :tools:
cmd.help.step.9:
You can gift something with `/gift`.
It can be apples or an item. :gift:
cmd.help.step.10:
You can also use apples to make a fake attack!
 Do `/trick` then `Fake Death Note`. :goblin:
cmd.help.step.11:
Use `/drop` and I can protect you for a while. :shield:
This would prevent you from using your Death Note, though.
cmd.help.step.12:
With apples, you can **remove** your attacking message,
or **get informations** about the one attacking you.
Try it. :apple:
cmd.help.step.14:
You can get your **statistics** with `/stats`.
There is also `/quest` to **never** run out of things to do.
Would you make it to the `/top`?
But mabe you didn't want to. :thinking:
cmd.help.step.15:
### Never forget : *You* choose your destiny. :index_pointing_at_the_viewer:
You can kill, get revenge, be rich, burn things...
Or just troll you friends.
**The Death Note has the power. It's up to *you*.**
cmd.help.step.16:
### Join and have fun
Are you ready to build your Kira's destiny?
- Meet others Kira in **[Kira's Kingdom]($[joinLink])**.
- Bring me in **[your own server]($[inviteLink])**.
cmd.help.step.17:
### Help and be helped
Send a letter to the King of Death if you have **any feedback** to provide.
Some examples : you need help, something is wrong, send a suggestion, found typo, report Ryuk...
If your request is intresting, you may **change the world**. :globe_with_meridians:
Start writing anytime with `/feedback`.
cmd.help.step.18:
### That it! :tada:
Full `/help` unlocked.
You can now :
- Send help message
- See all commands details
- Claim your **cool pen**
